name: Paul Daniels' Magic Adventure
overview: Join Paul Daniels in this huge Magical Adventure. The game mixes traditional Adventure techniques with graphics and action games. It is issued in two parts - this is just one of them. In Part 1, you arrive at a strange airport in the middle of the night. Just how strange, you'll soon discover. If you ever make it to your hotel, by bus, taxi, or hire car, you're going to have a whale of a time... playing roulette and going to Paul Daniels' Magic Show. You'll be amazed at his skill! But Paul's going to need your help, because a gang have threatened to kidnap his son Martin.
